column4: my /home is mounted to a 900GB ext3 partition. to date I haven't used more than 150GB of it. if I boot into a liveCD/USB session and use Gparted, can I resize this partition (shave about 50-60GB off it) without risking my data?
it should work fine, but nothing matches the glowing feeling of having that 150G backed up to a separate drive somewhere...
disk has never been cheaper. Why take the chance if the data are precious...
